      • createBook

        public Book createBook(String isbn,
                       String title,
                       String description,
                       int pubYear,
                       int copies)
                throws BookAlreadyExistsException
        Method creates a Book object with user input
        Parameters:
        isbn - ISBN of the book
        title - title of the book
        description - description of the book
        pubYear - publishing year of the book
        copies - number of copies of the book
        Returns:
        Book object
        Throws:
        BookAlreadyExistsException - if a book by the same ISBN already exists

      • editBook

        public Book editBook(int book_id,
                     String isbn,
                     String title,
                     String description,
                     int pubYear,
                     int copies)
              throws BookDoesntExistException,
                     BookAlreadyExistsException
        Method edits a Book object with user input
        Parameters:
        book_id - ID of the book
        isbn - ISBN of the book
        title - title of the book
        description - description of the book
        pubYear - publishing year of the book
        copies - number of copies of the book
        Returns:
        Book object
        Throws:
        BookAlreadyExistsException - if a book by the same ISBN already exists
        BookDoesntExistException - if the book doesn't exist

      • removeBook

        Method removes a Book object if all copies are present
        Parameters:
        book_id - ID of the book
        Throws:
        BookDoesntExistException - if book doesn't exist

      • addAuthorToBook

        public void addAuthorToBook(int book_id,
                            int author_id)
                     throws BookDoesntExistException,
                            AuthorDoesntExistException,
                            AuthorAndBookAreAlreadyConnectedException
        Method combines an Author object and a Book object in a BookAuthor object
        Parameters:
        book_id - ID of the book
        author_id - ID of the author
        Throws:
        BookDoesntExistException - if the book doesn't exist
        AuthorDoesntExistException - if the author doesn't exist
        AuthorAndBookAreAlreadyConnectedException - if the objects are already connected

      • removeAuthorFromBook

        public void removeAuthorFromBook(int book_id,
                                 int author_id)
                          throws AuthorDoesntExistException,
                                 BookDoesntExistException,
                                 AuthorAndBookAreNotConnectedException
        Method break the connection between an author and a book
        Parameters:
        book_id - ID of the book
        author_id - ID of the author
        Throws:
        BookDoesntExistException - if the book doesn't exist
        AuthorDoesntExistException - if the author doesn't exist
        AuthorAndBookAreNotConnectedException - if the objects are not connected

      • checkBookAuthor

        public boolean checkBookAuthor(int book_id,
                               int author_id)
        Method checks if a connection between a book and author objects exists
        Parameters:
        book_id - ID of the book
        author_id - ID of the author
        Returns:
        true if BookAuthor exists, false if not
